name: Puttsy
description:
Puttsy is a short game made for Ludum Dare 41 with the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". It was made by myself (@morrilet) and a few other fine folk over the course of 72 hours.

Hey jammers!

If you participated in Ludum Dare 41, go leave Puttsy a review and drop me a link to your game!
